website_summaries.verdict: This adorable duo from Toy Story 4 are all set to win some serious smiles in real life with their huggable feel and sweet scent.
pros: Offscreen, their hands come apart so can have some one on one time or share with a friend
Cotton candy scent is a nice touch that adds to their appeal
Impressive size, especially considering the price
cons: The Velcro might eventually wear out after repeated fastening and unfastening

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but recieved them dirty.
customer_reviews.text: They are really cute, and they smell good my son loved them. The thing is that I was disappointed in was the condition I recieved them in, they were dirty. As you can see in the picture, and I didn't see the point of returning them because my son had already taken them out of the box plus he had waited a while to receive them.
customer_reviews.author: AMPB

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but.......
customer_reviews.text: My son seriously wanted these. I saw the talking Ducky and Bunny in Walmart but they were $25. We really didn't care if they talked, and we liked the idea that these smelled like cotton candy. Overall, it was worth the money. My son brought Bunny to me a week later and showed me a small hole in a seam under the arm and another one on the bottom of his foot. Not super happy about it, but not worth returning. I stitched it up. Two days later... Another small hole in the other foot. It's not noticable, but he knows. I'll be doing some more sewing! However, they are soft, smell great and super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Better than pictured
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality stuffed animals and an excellent likeness from the movie. My son loves them and I would recommend to any toy story fan!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, cuddly, and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and smell so good! Actual licensed Disney product- and for the price it’s unbeatable! They arrived in great condition, they are super soft and cuddly! The Velcro that holds the hands together only adds to the cuteness. My daughter was THRILLED to receive this and knew exactly what it was as soon as I opened the package. She loves the sweet smell!! They do smell soooooo good! I am so happy I ordered this for her.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Willocks

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two children as an Easter gift. They love Toy Story 4 and these were their favorite characters. They are bright and came in perfect condition. What I love the most is that you can disconnect them as their hands are joined with velcro. Now each of my children can keep their favorite! There is a faux strawberry scent which isn't overwhelming but not overly pleasant. Overall, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: APSc

customer_reviews.title: Just adorable
customer_reviews.text: The movies a hit so are these. There not very small. My 8 year old granddaughter still adores toy story since she was 2 they Velcro together. Friends forever these are two big new characters that were a smash! At the box office and for dolls. Nice soft and smell great too!
customer_reviews.author: RAINASADDICTEDTOAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Just want my son wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are Velcro together where their hands meet. So you can take them part. They are durable, because my son takes them everywhere and sleeps with them and has given them a lot of love.
customer_reviews.author: Courteous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are just as described. They arrived quickly and are brand new. I was concerned after reading some of the other reviews stating theirs arrived dirty and out of the carton. My order arrived in the original Toy Story 4 carton and were in a plastic bag for protection. The price couldn’t have been better. My son is going to love these when he opens up his Easter basket! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my niece she loved them in the movie! They are of pretty good quality I wouldn't say are the best quality stuffed animals but for the price and the fact you are paying for branding, it's not bad they are super cute and soft and she loved them and that's what matters!
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: #1 present
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old wanted this badly for Christmas. It’s the only thing she was consistent on asking for from Santa. Really great price compared to stores so I snatched it up. Super soft & smells good too. Great gift for any kid especially if the love stuffed animals.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute! The Velcro holds em together well and they’re bigger than I anticipated. For the price, you can’t beat that! Also, they’re SCENTED just like in the movie. My baby loveeeees them. They’re super soft as well. Def happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Scott-Budd

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of these stuffed animals for the price. They are very soft and smell great! I split them up and put them in my kids Easter baskets. They haven’t been put down since Easter. Great addition to our Toy Story loving household!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same item!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these thinking I'd get the items in the pictures but what I received was completely different!! They came in a plastic bag instead of the box in the picture and although they're the same characters it is definitely NOT what I ordered. The eyes are completely different, there's no scent, and there's not magnets that stick the two together. They're just normal stuffed animals that happen to be the same character as the ones I wanted. Very disappointed in this considering it had decent reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: We love them!
customer_reviews.text: At first when we opened them we were kind of like omg.... because Bunnys eyes were a little off lol but now we're fine with it. The scent isn't overpowering and they're super soft! I didn't even notice they can be separated until my daughter pulled them apart at their velcro hands.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Malathong

customer_reviews.title: Don’t talk but perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Not one thing wrong with them. I didn’t realize they were scented in the title but it smells pretty good! We’ve had them 3 months and the smell is still fresh. Perfect addition to the collection. Just wish they spoke like the other characters
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don't put them by any living thing that can't move away on their own
customer_reviews.text: We had to move them into a different room so that my son could get to sleep. The smell is nice for a moment then is just obnoxious, or should we say noxious. We may be returning. Like taking cotton candy and jamming it up your nose!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Saladino

customer_reviews.title: Great price for two stuffed animals and they smell awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I was able to get these before the movie came out. My daughter fell in love with the characters from the movie trailer. They smell great and I love that they came as a set.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Avila

customer_reviews.title: Smell great
customer_reviews.text: Gifted as a bday gift my daughter loved it . Is a plush toy smells great very fruity like I washed it but I guess the smell penetrated can still catch time to time the scent . Great room companion or decor.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: They are soooooo cute and fluffy and they smell great you just want to hug them whenever you see them. I got it for my 4yo son who really love Toystory, he can’t sleep without them now
customer_reviews.author: BinTamim

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute!! I didn’t realize they were scented but they do smell good. The bunny’s mouth is defective but it’s funny. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Leahey

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: super cute and not expensive. definitely not like the ones at the store..these look a little different and the material looks shiny. my son still has fun with them
customer_reviews.author: NancyFlowerss

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought I was going to receive the scented one but instead I got the one that talks. I like it but the only thing that bothers me is that when they connect to each other duckey doesn’t respond back. It’s a perfect gift though and they are a good size for a toddler and for people who like to collect toys 😁
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Perez

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: These adorable are the best and the aroma of blueberry is lasting and I have with them about 3 months and still with its aroma I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooo soft and they really do smell good! I wish the bunny had the whiskers from the movie, but still very cute and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these 2. She carries them all around day after day, They are holding up well. They are very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Smell like candy!
customer_reviews.text: Omg they are soo cute! They smell of cotton candy! They look just like the film. They hold hands and separate if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Veach

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not the same product. Arrived in just a bag. No tags or nothing! No magnetic attachment like it says. Disappointed this time. Returning product
customer_reviews.author: KC Dean

customer_reviews.title: They are so fluffy
customer_reviews.text: my little one loves them so much. that one thing I hate about it is the plastic locking that buried deep into the dolls themselves that I can't pull out.
customer_reviews.author: Macomatic

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 4 but, come 3
customer_reviews.text: It's new as describe. But not complete, ordered4 but come3. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: khim

customer_reviews.title: Not scented
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived with a tear in it and the product was not scented. I don’t think it will stand up to toddler playtime.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: So nice.
customer_reviews.text: My son has almost all the toy story toys and he loves these two especially. They look just like they did in the movie. We're so obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Ja’llena Damion

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: It was very cute but I thought the smell would be a little stronger. Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great toys!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these toys and he is crazy about Toy Story. They are really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Ricciardelli

customer_reviews.title: Made my Grandson happy
customer_reviews.text: Got for my grandson for his birthday. He collects the characters from Toy Story. If he’s happy, Grandma is happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: kayk

customer_reviews.title: They have electronics in them.... Not stated
customer_reviews.text: We got ones that don't smell and they are electronic. These aren't plush like stated. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bunny and Ducky
customer_reviews.text: These 2 funny characters look great. My daughter absolutely loves these dolls. Their scent is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this was suppose to talk, mine did not. But I’m absolutely happy with my purchase. SUPER soft. Got it for my sister and cousin (18 year olds, who love TOY STORY 4) They were so happy! They were able to attach the dolls and each keep one.
customer_reviews.author: Chanelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute Toy Story stuffed animals
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves Toy Story and was so excited to get these for her birthday! They were made well!
customer_reviews.author: KdKim

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: My nephews LOVED It, size was bigger than I thought, this was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Vio

customer_reviews.title: Adorable lovies!
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for these characters for Christmas and the scent was just a bonus. He sleeps with them every night. So soft and sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our kid is going to LOVE his new stuffed toys
customer_reviews.text: They looked exactly like what was presented. These toys were scented as cotton candy! I'm giving this gift to our toddler for Easter, so to make sure that the scent remains, I am keeping it inside a sealed bag. The quality of the toys are spot-on. Glad we ordered these. And they came to us overnight, which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: David Orr

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Super cute studies and they smelled amazing, unfortunately after 1 week of being played with the bunny’s back ripped open.
customer_reviews.author: HeartMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter turning 9. She received plenty of gifts from family but this was by far her favorite! Very cute and decent size! Still smells great two months later!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: We wanted these and all stores were sold out! They are perfect thank you
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as pictured. My son wanted this for xmas. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: THEY SMELL LIKE CANDY
customer_reviews.text: So cool. 4 year old LOVED THEM. I opened the box and it smelled like heaven
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rowan

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: These are such a bargain! They are the perfect size, they are SUPER SOFT! The even have Velcro on their hands so you can connect just like in Toy Story 4. Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good Toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas, he love it. They have the flavor smell to them and they are just toys.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Plushy!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, soft, and smell very nice!! My daughter will love these!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Graham

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love this, Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cant ask for more out of this product, Good Quality and Looks Good. Kids Love!!
customer_reviews.author: Roger A.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great price and they smell so good! My baby boy loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexaa

customer_reviews.title: Plush Rush success!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Disney makes different versions of these but these were way cheaper than any I could find. They are scented sort of a strawberry/ berry scent. They can connect or disconnect from each other. Very soft and well made.
customer_reviews.author: C. Villa

customer_reviews.title: MATANGA DIJO LA CHANGA
customer_reviews.text: My collection is growing And these are great I love the smell
customer_reviews.author: Laloo

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't the same product as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Not the same product but pretty close, it was the talking Bunny and Duckie instead. I didn't want to go through the hassle of return for the right product.
customer_reviews.author: motivatedmama32

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for a birthday gift, one of the few Toy Story characters she didn't have... She absolutely loves it and that alone gets 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Nickolson

customer_reviews.title: SON LOVES- VERY SOFT&CUTE
customer_reviews.text: Son loves! Not sure what sent is but smells like cotton candy to me. Very soft and cute
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Short

customer_reviews.title: Cute but scented...
customer_reviews.text: Cutest toy- kids love it. The only reason I didn't give five stars is because I don't understand why it is scented? I think that was kind of unnecessary...
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Better quality and price then any other store product currently available.
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, they come apart, are super soft and smell good too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but the bunny came with an open back
customer_reviews.author: emilymd

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wants the whole collection. I’ve bought pieces from several companies these fit right in.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loved it and it smelled good even after using lysol on it lol. Great value for the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Roehrig

customer_reviews.title: Soft and smell good!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and smell great. I bought them for my son for his birthday to add to his Toy Story collection and he loved them.
customer_reviews.author: webba

customer_reviews.title: Nicely scented
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these fluffy toys smell! Soft yummy scent
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Box came in completely destroyed the characters look like cheap chinese knockoffs save your money and buy it in a store insted.
customer_reviews.author: chris halvorsen

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these. Sleeps with them every night.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Scent us a little chemically but very cute plushy
customer_reviews.text: Love the stuffers and my son was pleased. Exactly what we ordered
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Gave them as a gift. They looks great and are very soft. And they smells nice too.

customer_reviews.title: My son love this toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Easter for his Easter basket and he loved it. Its very soft and great price.

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves Toy Story 4. This toy made her very happy.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: smells like strawberries
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for my friend who loved them in the movies when you open the package you can smell the strawberries scent its amazing

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Soft
customer_reviews.text: Loveee them ! Got them for my baby brother who is obsessed with toy story !

customer_reviews.title: Happy six-year-old
customer_reviews.text: My six-year-old was very pleased with the toy. It even smelled really good

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TS fan toy
customer_reviews.text: Cute set. They have a Velcro attachment to the hand. Bunny is stuffed firm
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: What about the old plush rush?
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 6-year-old niece and she absolutely loved them. They look great, super cute. They're also scented! A nice fresh smell almost like bubbles?
customer_reviews.author: Amaz_Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids who love stuffed toys!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these! The smell great and are bigger than i thought.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected.  Very nice, soft stuffed toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so surprised when he received and all smiles! He loves it! It’s also larger than expected.

customer_reviews.title: slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: doesn’t come in the packaging as pictured. the stuff animals are bell crowed together instead of stuck together. they are scented tho.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter who loves Toy Story. She loved it! So soft, and they smell great!

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Got them for Christmas been almost two months and they still have a good smell.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly stitched together
customer_reviews.text: Items seams are coming apart in multiple spots. Very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Used product.
customer_reviews.text: Clearly a used product. Did not come in original packaging. Just wrapped in a bag. Very disappointed

customer_reviews.text: My grandson was thrilled with these gifts. That’s what means the most to me

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars

customer_reviews.text: My grand baby absolutely love it, it was a great choice

customer_reviews.title: Adorable

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the toys so much! Made my son very happy!!!

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fluffy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift. My son really wanted these guys. They are soft and fluffy and their eyes are sparkly. They are closest to what they look like in the movie. (Not as large as other plush I have found but the quality over quantity rings true in this case.)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Just like the movie!
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like they do in the movie!! SO cute!!!! I LOVE it! Thank you!! (Side note: the fuzzy-ness does seem to shed a little bit, )
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

product_meta.title: Disney-Pixar's Toy Story 4 Scented Friendship Plush Set, Ducky & Bunny
product_meta.description: Color:Multi-color​Bring home the excitement of disneypixar's Toy Story 4 with the ducky bunny scented friendship plush set. Ducky and bunny can be joined at the hands or easily come apart for individual play! Friends stick together, so ducky and bunny can fasten hands again and can go on adventures together like the best friends They are! Both are scented to smell like sweet Cotton Candy! Ducky and bunny are made with Super soft fabrics that are perfect for cuddling. Toy Story 4 fans will love playing and cuddling with this adorable duo! Ages 3+ ​
feature_bullets: This product ships in a polybag.
Bring home the excitement of DisneyPixar's Toy Story 4 with the Ducky Bunny Scented Friendship Plush set. Ducky and Bunny can be joined at the hands or easily come apart for individual play.
Set includes: Ducky Plush and Bunny Plush
Plush can stick together at the hands like the BFFs they are!
Can be separated for play time and stuck back together for friendship hugs!
Both plush pals smell like cotton candy!

specifications.Included Components: Disney•Pixar's Toy Story 4 Scented Friendship Plush Set, Ducky & Bunny
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars790 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
